## WCAG Guidelines Affected
Please check relevant WCAG 2.1 guidelines:

**Perceivable:**
- [ ] 1.1 Text Alternatives
- [ ] 1.3 Adaptable (structure, meaning)
- [ ] 1.4 Distinguishable (color, contrast, audio)

**Operable:**
- [ ] 2.1 Keyboard Accessible
- [ ] 2.2 Enough Time
- [ ] 2.3 Seizures and Physical Reactions
- [ ] 2.4 Navigable

**Understandable:**
- [ ] 3.1 Readable
- [ ] 3.2 Predictable
- [ ] 3.3 Input Assistance

**Robust:**
- [ ] 4.1 Compatible (assistive technologies)
